Rulings.Edison:
●In order to activate its effect, Fox Fire must be face-up when the attack that destroyed it was declared (like Atomic Firefly). If a face-down Fox Fire is attacked, its effect is not applied even though it is face-up when destroyed.
●While Skill Drain is active, you can Tribute Fox Fire for a Tribute Summon.
●If the opponent controls your face-up Fox Fire, and it is destroyed as a result of battle, it will be Special Summoned to your (the owner’s) side of the field during the End Phase.

Rulings.Base: 1. In order to activate its effect, "Fox Fire" must be face-up when the attack that destroyed it was declared (like "Atomic Firefly"). If a face-down "Fox Fire" is attacked, its effect is not applied even though it is face-up when destroyed.\n2. While "Skill Drain" is active, you can Tribute "Fox Fire" for a Tribute Summon.\n3. If the opponent controls your face-up "Fox Fire", and it is destroyed as a result of battle, it will be Special Summoned to your (the owner's) side of the field during the End Phase.

PSCT.Base: During the End Phase, if this card was destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard this turn and was face-up at the start of the Damage Step: Special Summon this card from the Graveyard. This face-up card cannot be Tributed for a Tribute Summon.
